prompt: Create a whimsical fantasy artwork of the Mystic Swamp. Focus on a cluster of glowing, enchanted mushrooms in a dark, misty swamp. The mushrooms emit a magical light, illuminating the area around them. Surrounding the mushrooms are ancient, gnarled trees with glowing runes etched into their bark and tiny, floating fireflies. The scene should feel mysterious and fantastical, with a touch of eerie charm.
